Html:
Hi!

please can you help me? How to change code to  display the author's name in bold:

 SARSBY, R.; Environmental Geotechnics. London: Thomas Telford, 2000. 584 p. ISBN 0-7277-2752-4.

 

{%Author:2|Editor:3|Compiler:6|Title:f%.}{ %Title:mr% %Title:s%}.}{ Tradu��o de %Translator:5%.}{ %Edition%. ed.}{ %City|"[S.l.]"%: %Publisher|"[s.n.]"%,}{ v. %Volume%,}{ %Year%{%YearSuffix%}.}{ %Pages::% p.}.{ ISBN %StandardNumber%.}{ Disponivel em: <%URL%>.}{ Acesso em: {{%DayAccessed% }%MonthAccessed:s% }%YearAccessed%.}{ %Comments%.}

Use the html codes for bold. An explaination can be found in the documentation.

{<b>%Author:2|Editor:3|Compiler:6|Title:f%.</b>}

But now it doesn't shoe title :  [5] SARSBY, R. London: Thomas Telford, 2000. 584 p. ISBN 0-7277-2752-4.

 

 

<format>[%RefOrder%] {<b>%Author:2|Editor:3|Compiler:6|Title:f%.</b>}{ %Title:mr%%Title:s%}.}{ Tradução de %Translator:5%.}{ %Edition%. ed.}{ %City|"[S.l.]"%: %Publisher|"[s.n.]"%,}{ v. %Volume%,}{ %Year%{%YearSuffix%}.}{ %Pages::% p.}.{ ISBN %StandardNumber%.}{ Disponivel em: <%URL%>.}{ Acesso em: {{%DayAccessed% }%MonthAccessed:s% }%YearAccessed%.}{ %Comments%.}</format>

You have an extra unbalance bracket after the title part: {%Title:mr%%Title:s%}.}   . Remember, { } always needs to be balanced.

But what exactly are you trying to do with the title? Because normally you would just need %Title%. Not sure why you would try to split and then rejoin.

{<b>%Author:2|Editor:3|Compiler:6|Title%.</b>}{%Title%}
I try to change ABNT to Bulgarian Reference Standards
